Constraints Data Objects package¶

Channel Module¶

channel.py

Data object representing a radio channel. Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)

class cp1.data_objects.processing.channel.Channel(frequency, length, latency, capacity)¶

Bases: object

__init__(frequency, length, latency, capacity)¶

Constructor

Parameters:
  • frequency (Frequency) – The frequency this channel sends data over.
  • length (Milliseconds) – The total time over which the channel can schedule TAs. Equal to epoch.
  • latency (Milliseconds) – Required delay between each transmisison for any TA.
  • capacity (Kbps) – Throughput capacity. [1Mbps, 10Mbps]

Constraints Object Module¶

constraints_object.py

Data object representing a constraints object. Author: Tameem Samawi (tsamawi@cra.com)

class cp1.data_objects.processing.constraints_object.ConstraintsObject(goal_throughput_bulk, goal_throughput_voice, goal_throughput_safety, latency, guard_band, epoch, txop_timeout, candidate_tas, channels)¶

Bases: object

__init__(goal_throughput_bulk, goal_throughput_voice, goal_throughput_safety, latency, guard_band, epoch, txop_timeout, candidate_tas, channels)¶

Constructor

Parameters:
  • goal_throughput_bulk (BandwidthRate) – The new value for all Bulk ServiceLevelProfiles.
  • goal_throughput_voice (BandwidthRate) – The new value for all Voice ServiceLevelProfiles.
  • goal_throughput_safety (BandwidthRate) – The new value for all Safety ServiceLevelProfiles.
  • latency (Milliseconds) – The gap in time between transmissions for a given TA
  • guard_band (Milliseconds) – The unused part of the radio spectrum between radio bands to prevent interference.
  • txop_timeout (TxOpTimeout) – The timeout value for TxOp nodes
  • candidate_tas (List[TA]) – List of potential TA’s.
  • channels (List[Channel]) – Channel specific data such as the amount of throughput available
